alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:50PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Box Elder and north central Tooele Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 949 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Knolls, or 31 miles east of Wendover, moving east northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range North. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 56 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
